ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] Levels, again.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... David got his Tryx levels to us .. hmm, way back when :) Basically, back when we were working on Gladiator much more often than we do now :) I d be happy

From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...>


>Tom, Tom, where are you? Just out of curiosity, how did David Chan get Tryx
>posted on the real Glad page? I'm sure there are some players that aren't on
>the mailing list, and they won't know about any new levels coming out...

David got his Tryx levels to us .. hmm, way back when :) Basically, back 
when we were working on Gladiator much more often than we do now :)

I'd be happy to put up other sets of levels for people .. basically, I just 
need someone (or the list at large) to verify that (a) they don't suck, and 
(b) they won't screw up people's existing levels when they're unzipped to a 
directory.. I used to try to do both of those myself .. and that's why 
there aren't really many levels up there :) But if some of you can do the 
hard part, and then send me the files zipped up as an e-mail attachment, I 
can try to put them on the page.

--Tom
